summary:
Head to toe protection. New armor set for various character types.
Includes a new crafting system.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#974806][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][b][i]
[img]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c18/lfostelr/descriptrion_zps3acabe17.png[/img]


Adds Cuir Bouilli Leather Armor Crafting to Skyrim. [/i][/b][/size][/font][/color][/center][center][color=#974806][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][b][i]
A new custom armor mesh designed to blend into Skyrim seamlessly. Cuir Bouilli is basically Water Hardened Leather. The process mainly involves boiling leather in oils and waxes, then drying it. The resulting material is much harder, and more firm that it was. I thought this would fit well into Skyrim, so I made this armor set. [/i][/b][/size][/font][b][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][i]The armor is a perfect fit for a wide variety of characters;[/i][/size][/font][/b][/color][/center]
[center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][i][color=#974806]
[/color][/i][/size][/font][/b][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][i][color=#974806]Hunters[/color][/i][/size][/font][/b][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]
[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]Thieves [/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]
[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]Assassins[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]
[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][color=#974806][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][b][i]All these classes have their own armor sets, but they kind of stand out in a crowd.  I wanted this set to fit each of these play styles, and still look like something that doesn't scream "Hey guild member over here!"



[youtube]MdrHD5Ax2jc[/youtube][/i][/b][/size][/font][/color][/center][center][color=#974806][b][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][i]
[/i][/size][/font][/b][/color][/center][center][color=#974806][b][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][i]This armor is is classed as light, and should work with all related perks. [/i][/size][/font][/b][/color][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][i][color=#974806]
[/color][/i][/size][/font][/b][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][i][color=#974806]Fully upgradeable[/color][/i][/size][/font][/b][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]Craftable[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]Fully gender support[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]Lore friendly design
Full slider support
Supports Frostfall W.E.A.R. System[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]New crafting system[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]
[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]Since I liked the concept of Cuir Bouilli, I included it as a new crafting system.  You will need to craft the armor at a tanning rack, but before doing that, you must craft your raw materials.

[img]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c18/lfostelr/pot_zpsc4a887e7.jpg[/img][/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]
[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]You can craft Water Hardened leather, at the [/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]new crafting station (the Cuir Bouilli Pot) at the Skyforge.[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][i][color=#974806]You will need :[/color][/i][/size][/font][/b][/center][center][b][color=#974806][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][i]Leather[/i][/size][/font][/color][/b][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]Wax Oil[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]
[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]There is some free wax oil near the pot, and Belethor also sells some. [/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]Be sure to stock up on leather, since you will craft it [/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][color=#974806][b][i]in bulk (13 leather to 10 hardened leather).[/i][/b][/color][/size][/font][/center][center][/center]
[font=Palatino Linotype][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/font]
author: Foster
